Today, not only Istanbul, but all of Turkey has a historical moment. 6 The largest airport in the continent is starting to rise in Istanbul today.
Today we are building not only an airport, but a victory monument.
3. The airport will be the world's largest airport with 6 runways and an annual capacity of 150 million passengers.
Our enemies are also watching us right now and are experiencing a great disappointment as they can not prevent this major airport project.
Everyone knows that Turkey is no longer a country that has accepted the failure, subjugated itself to luck, and is condemned to the role it has drawn to itself.

PM Netanyahu at weekly Cabinet meeting: Over the weekend, the leaders of Hamas reiterated their intention to destroy the State of Israel.
Whoever hoped that the Palestinian unity between Fatah and Hamas would moderate Hamas is mistaken.
Instead of the PA taking over Gaza it seems that the opposite is taking place: Hamas increasing control in the PA areas in Judea and Samaria
Therefore, international pressure must be applied on Abu Mazen to dissolve the partnership with Hamas.
This touches on the roots of the conflict and the roots of a solution in which peace is achieved between us and the Palestinians.
In any case, Abu Mazen promised to uphold all of his previous commitments, and the first of these is honoring the commitment>
> To demilitarize the areas under the control of the Palestinian government, including - of course - the Gaza Strip.

Today I presided over the Cabinet meeting where we expressed our congratulations to the Egyptian people and to His Excellency President Abdelfattah Al-Sisi on the occasion of his swearing-in as president of Egypt.

Our historical relations with the Republic of Egypt in the strongest stages, and the stability of Egypt is a support for the stability of our Arab world, and the prosperity of Egypt is a guarantee for the return of its pivotal role
We also welcomed today the formation of the Higher Committee between the UAE and Saudi Arabia to promote and consolidate the historic partnership between the two brotherly countries

We always cherish our distinguished relationship with the Kingdom and its people, and always draw on the wisdom of its king, and we count on this partnership to enhance the stability and prosperity of the region.
We also launched today at our meeting the Government of the UAE channel on the YouTube site to introduce our services, facilitate them and increase their effectiveness http://t.co/vSOUOe6Yg1
We always strive to simplify the process of communicating with government clients, and to reach people via their smartphones to explain and deliver the service at the same time

It is not permissible for the outside to take care of the presidential benefit, while we are in the development of preconditions, followed by conditions against the specifications of the President is going to
Let the outsiders away from this entitlement, and participate in the parliamentary sessions until the election of the President.
... It is also not appropriate for Lebanon's long-standing democracy to be satisfied with dancing in the election of friendly and brotherly elections. http://t.co/8td0w40jkY

Today I changed a cabinet meeting. We congratulated the Egyptians & President Abdel Fattah Al Sisi for taking the oath as Egypt's president
Our historical ties with Egypt are at their best today. Egypt's stability empowers its pivotal role and support stability in the Arab world
During our meeting we also saluted forming an Emirati-Saudi higher committee to strengthen the historic partnership between our countries
We take pride in our distinguished relationship with Saudi, its people and wise king, & we count on it to enhance the outlook of our region
We also launched UAE govt. channel on YouTube to explain govt. services & their procedures to make them easier & more effective
The court ruling today for the unconstitutionality of Mr.Maetig's election by the GNC is a monumental step in establishing democracy.
